headline: Get ready for the beta.
description: With a great app comes great community. The beta app will need user experience experts from all around. We need you to help us make Resonance the best music discovery app.
offer: Should you choose to sign up for the beta, we'll give you the beta download link when it's ready, a walk-through of a few settings you'll have to tweak on your phone, and a feedback & suggestions form on the app that will teach us more about how you want to discover your music.
statement: Sign up to officially become a beta tester.
